revised_title: Numerical Investigation of Plane Detonation Evolution
tldr: The authors conducted numerical simulations using the Navier-Stokes equations to study the evolution of plane detonations in a combustible gas mixture. They found that reduced reaction rates lead to the formation of a ZND detonation behind the precursor shock. The study confirms and expands upon previous interpretations of direct ZND-wave initiation and provides insights into the processes occurring during the transition.
